item.title: My Maleficent costume scared kids Angelina Jolie
item.description: Angelina Jolie said that except her fiveyearold daughter Vivienne who is starring in the Disneys upcoming thriller as the young Princess Aurora none of her other children come close to her

item.title: Ali Zafar gives up the lead in sequel to Tere Bin Laden
item.description: In factnbspZafar opted for another character to make the film more interesting I thought I would be more excited to do the film if I could take up one particular role We have done something interesting When the movie releases you will see it he says
item.itunes:subtitle: In factnbspZafar opted for another character to make the film more interesting I thought I would be more excited to do the film if I could take up one particular role We have done something interesting When the movie releases you will see it he says

item.title: Why womens empowerment is a bad idea on Indian TV
item.description: Be it Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Sasural Simar Ka Uttaran Doli Armaanno Ki Pavitra Rishta or Gustakh Dil the stories focus more on how girls forgo their career goals and objectives in an attempt to make everyone happy
item.itunes:subtitle: Be it Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Sasural Simar Ka Uttaran Doli Armaanno Ki Pavitra Rishta or Gustakh Dil the stories focus more on how girls forgo their career goals and objectives in an attempt to make everyone happy

item.title: I am excited to work with Salman Khan Sonam Kapoor

item.title: Highway is my best film so far Imtiaz Ali
item.description: Ask filmmaker Imtiaz Alinbsp if he agrees with the view that Highway is his best so far and he says To be shyhonest I would want every shylatest film of mine to be my best But I dont know if it is my best film But yes It is my best film so far He lashes out at critics who wrote off his recent film Highway says criticism has to be positive

item.title: Vidya Balan returns to TV
item.description: Actor Vidya Balan who started her innings in showbiz with television will be seen on the small screen for an International Womens Day special She will be seen as the host of a show called No More Kamzor which will talk of women who have struggled and overcome problems

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan half of my films flopped but Im still a superstar

item.title: Memorable to act with father son in Manam Nagarjuna
item.description: Nagarjuna who hasnbspworked with his late father Nageswara Rao and Naga Chaitanya in Telugu drama Manam says the experience was adventurous and memorable

item.title: Shankars magnum opus Ai almost complete

item.title: Deepika Padukone pockets Rs 6 crore for endorsement deal
item.description: After delivering four backtoback big grossers last year Deepika Padukone has now reportedly signed an endorsement deal for around Rs 6 crore With this deal she enters the big league of celeb endorsers

item.title: Was Ellens Oscar selfie just a stunt by Samsung
item.description: Ellen DeGeneres celebstudded selfie from the mostwatched Oscars telecast in a decade was a landmark social media moment at a time online conversation is boosting television viewership and vice versa Its also a murky example of what is or isnt product placement in a hypermarketed world

item.title: Manam gears up for Ugadi release

item.title: Im confident Aishwarya will like Happy Anniversary script Prahlad Kakkar
item.description: Bollywood actor Aishwarya Rai Bachchan is yet to hear the script of Prahlad Kakas muchhyped film Happy Anniversary which hes planned with her hubby Abhishek Bachchan but the admanturnedfilmmaker seems pretty confident about a positive response from her

item.title: Bollywood heroines go on sick leave
item.description: Long schedules and erratic working hours have landed Katrina Kaif Alia Bhatt Deepika Padukone Shruti Haasan and Tabu on sick bed Their troubles range from fever exhaustion stomach achenbspto breathing problems

item.title: Yeh Hai Bakrapur trailer Shahrukh is a bakra in this film
item.description: The trailer of Janaki Vishwanathans film Yeh Hai Bakrapur not only tells the story of a goat called Shahrukh it also claims that this summer being bakra is better than being human We wonder if that has something to do with SRKs ace rival Salman Khan

item.title: Spotted Arjun shoots for Tevar at Taj Mahal
item.description: Actor Arjun Kapoor was spotted shooting for his next Tevar at the Taj Mahal on Sunday The film which also stars actor Sonakshi Sinha is a remake of Telugu film Okkadu 2013

item.title: Kaaviya gave me freedom to innovate with folk music Rahman

item.title: Im with the times not behind it Randeep Hooda

item.title: Madhuri Dixit takes to revolutionary Hindi poetry in Gulaab Gang
item.description: Shayari in Dedh Ishqiya rebellious poetry in Gulaab Gang the dhak dhak diva Madhuri Dixit is in the Indian classical culture mode The actor talks about her love for classical culture and doing her bit as an artist

item.title: It is due to my lack of patience that Im not married Ekta Kapoor
item.description: Television and film producer Ekta Kapoor is 38 and single As a result shes often asked about her relationship status On most days she handles these questions with aplomb by joking about them or brushing them off But there have also been times when she has simply clammed shut

item.title: I understand why Aamir had a tough time working with Salman says Sohail
item.description: Aamir Khan said in an interview that his memory of working with Salman was very badnbsp Salmans brother and filmmaker Sohail Khan says I understand Aamir bhais point Salman bhai is a spontaneous actor
item.itunes:subtitle: Aamir Khan said in an interview that his memory of working with Salman was very badnbsp Salmans brother and filmmaker Sohail Khan says I understand Aamir bhais point Salman bhai is a spontaneous actor
